name: The Lost Valley
description:
Game story:

Your plane was destroyed by lightning near an unknown continent.
You're the only survivor on the plane.
After some exploration, we found that there are many enemies hidden here.
Look for guns and kill the enemy!
Get out of this forest!

Content and games

-Players operate characters to fight with enemies

-All kinds of guns

-Explore the vast map

Features of the game:

-The first person is a really exciting way to play.

-Players need to collect the enemy's guns to deal with the enemy.

-Please pay attention to the enemy. They are hiding in a secret place

Game control mode:
A-right
S-back
W-forward
D-right
F-pick up guns
Left click - shoot!
